name: BoudicaTalk
_source: s;Boudica;I am well enough.{w} Though my time with you may be at an end soon.
s;Boudica;Make no mistake, I shall aid you through this betrayal.|But I am no royal guard.|Once your army has laid down its weapons, I will say goodbye.
s;Simon;I wouldn't ask anything else.{w} Your aid has been invaluable.
s;Boudica;As has yours.{w} I only hope that the peace we've brought will last.
